message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product and I think you'd really appreciate its value. I'm offering it to you for $9,500.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $8,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position.  While I value the product at more than $8,500, I'm willing to come down to $9,000 to make this work. This is my final offer, let's close the deal!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I can offer $8,750 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
Bob, I'm really trying to work with you here. Let's split the difference - I'm offering $8,875.  This is a fair price for both of us.  I hope you'll accept this offer.
